name: FarmingHero
0:
”Alexa, open farming hero”
”Alexa, play farming hero”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: farming hero
des:
Escape the stressful city life on your very own farm!
- Earn coins by growing crops, catching fish, and foraging for natural resources.
- Complete requests from the town bulletin board to earn experience points and level up your farm.
- 30 different product types to unlock.
- Climb the weekly global leaderboard by earning the most coins every week.

Support & Feedback:
support@smartpenguin.digital
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
